side_a.description: Move to SLOW DOWN position. Avoid attacks to the back this turn.

side_b.description: Damage reduction this turn..

side_a.description: Reduce all fuel costs by 1 permanently.

side_b.description: Reduce the fuel cost of the next action by 3.

side_a.description: SLOW DOWN. Permanent +2 damage to attacks in the front.

side_b.description: Attack in any direction. Add fuel spent so far as additional damage to this attack.

side_a.description: Attack to the back.

side_b.description: OVERTAKE. Avoid next enemy attack.

side_a.description: SLOW DOWN. If you begin your next turn on a SLOW DOWN position, all actions in that turn cost 1 fuel.

side_b.description: SLOW DOWN. If you begin your next turn in a SLOW DOWN position, reduce the next action's fuel cost by 1.

side_a.description: Attack to the back.

side_b.description: Avoid an attack to the side.

side_a.description: Attack to the front. Disable enemy next action.

side_b.description: Attack to the back. Enemy cant move next turn.

side_a.description: A devastating attack to the side and back.

side_b.description: OVERTAKE. +2 to the next attack.

side_a.description: Attack to the back. Enemy suffers +1 extra damage until they overtake.

side_b.description: Next turn your actions cost less per point of damage received this turn.

side_a.description: Attack to the front or side. Increase enemy fuel cost by 2 next turn.

side_b.description: Attack to the front or side. Increase the fuel cost of the next enemy action by 5.

side_b.description: OVERTAKE. Avoid all enemy actions next turn. Reduce your damage by 2.
